name: Bjcochrane.GitHub.io
body:
# Projects under way

##  TeachingPopGen

This is the rudimentary R package that I use for teaching my course in Evolutionary and Population Genetics.  It is available for installation via devtools and install_github at bjcochrane/TeachingPopGen

## Population Genetics with R

This is a text that I've developed over the past several years.  It was written in RStudio and is constantly being upgraded.

## Genetics 9e

This is a more proprietary project - a textbook revision - so not much, other than some occasional exploratory material, will show up here.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
